jobs_results.title: Russian speaking Android Developer VAC-18125M
jobs_results.company_name: StaffMatters Recruitment Specialists on behalf of a client
jobs_results.description:
Our client is the biggest branchless (fully online) bank, providing the best and unique financial services for clients to work with their accounts online. They are looking for a Russian speaking Android Developer for their office based in Limassol.

Responsibilities:
Develop applications related to the areas of banking and social networking
Develop and write documentation to the library of mobile application components
Find effective solutions of non-standard tasks
Write code that will work consistently and will not disappoint those who open it after you
Work in an Agile team, actively interact with analysts, developers and testers - directly and without bureaucracy
Continuously develop your skills and expertise

Requirements:
3+ years in Android applications development
Excellent knowledge of Java Core, Android SDK, RxJava
Excellent knowledge of structures implementations (Lists, Arrays, Maps), interfaces, classes in Java
Excellent knowledge of jmv operation: multithreading, memory management, garbage collection, etc.
Excellent understanding of Android applications design principles: memory management, multithreading, Storage, UI, lifecycle and events
Strong understanding of Android applications architecture design patterns
Strong understanding of OOP principles, SOLID principles, knowledge of general algorithms (search, sort, etc., knowledge of algorithms complexity, O-notation) and design patterns
Experience developing applications in Kotlin
Holder of completed projects in app stores, github account
Good understanding in UI design
Code-review experience (code quality control)
Understanding the principles of integration of a client application into an existing system
Server application development experience (Java, Scala, Python)
DB experience (Oracle, SQLite)
Experience in developing bash / Unix shell scripts
Experience with git version control system - console, IDE, web (Stash)
Good teamplayer
Fluency in the Russian language (both written and spoken)
Enthusiasm to get deeper into the business context, understand the tasks and problems of users and strive to make truly useful products
Holder of a valid Cyprus residence and work permit

Benefits:
Interesting and meaningful tasks
Structured career development, supported by training that provides the opportunity to learn and develop
Competitive salary and benefits packages dependent on relevant skills and level of experience
Comfortable office, well-equipped workplace set up to your wishes (Mac / Win / Linux, Notebook / PC)
Excellent friendly team of professionals, potential to raise the levels of your expertise
Health insurance

jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer - Flutter
jobs_results.description:
The leading app in the music-tech world is looking for a powerful Mobile Flutter Developer

First things first, if you are looking for a fully remote role with flexible hours, unlimited time off, and are based somewhere in Europe or Asia, read on üåç
About BlueThrone

Embark on a transformative journey with BlueThrone, a pioneer in the mobile app domain.

Our Specialization: Turning B2C mobile apps into market leaders, boasting over 49.5 million downloads and 4.6 million monthly active users.

Our Mission: Propel iOS and Android applications to new heights. We've achieved a remarkable $8M ARR organically in just 25 months, exemplifying sustainable growth and innovation.

Our Team: Rich in tech entrepreneurship and mobile marketing expertise, we thrive in an environment that values agility, growth mindset, flexibility, creativity, and tangible outcomes.

At BlueThrone, your career is more than a job - it's a journey toward excellence in an innovative culture where high performance is as valued as innovation.

About Our Unicorn

You will join one of our shining unicorns: an innovative music analytics mobile platform that has quickly become a staple for music lovers globally.

Our Reach: Launched in 2020, we've organically reached over 20 million users, allowing them to analyze, track, and compare their musical tastes while connecting directly with their favorite artists.

Our Growth: Has been entirely organic, demonstrating strong product-market fit and high user engagement.

Our Coverage: This platform has penetrated 35+ languages and 190+ markets, with a diverse user base and substantial revenue streams.

The Role

We are looking for a Flutter Developer to help build our revolutionary music tech app. This role is not just about coding it's a calling for those who can harmonize technology and music to create seamless mobile experiences.
What are we looking for? üîé
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of professional mobile app development experience
‚Ä¢ 3+ years building high-quality Flutter apps
‚Ä¢ Dart Expertise: Strong knowledge of Dart and its ecosystem
‚Ä¢ IDE Proficiency: Skilled with Android Studio and Visual Studio Code
‚Ä¢ Architectural Know-how: Experience designing app architecture using patterns like BLoC or Provider
‚Ä¢ Firebase Skills: Familiarity with Firebase services is a plus
‚Ä¢ Team Player: Comfortable with collaboration and code reviews
‚Ä¢ Continuous Learner: Keen to stay updated with new tech trends
‚Ä¢ In-App Purchase Experience: Knowledge of implementing in-app purchases in Flutter (desired)
‚Ä¢ Cultural Awareness: Experience in multicultural work environments is valued

Things we'll trust you with...
‚Ä¢ Async Programming: Handle concurrency using Dart's async features
‚Ä¢ Architecture: Build and maintain robust apps using clean, scalable code
‚Ä¢ State Management: Implement effective state management solutions
‚Ä¢ API Integration: Develop solid networking components for REST APIs
‚Ä¢ Quality Assurance: Conduct thorough unit and widget testing

You‚Äôll love it here if:
‚Ä¢ You prefer flexible hours, unlimited time off, and the ability to work from anywhere.
‚Ä¢ You are naturally curious and eager to drive impact for both users and the business.
‚Ä¢ You enjoy wearing multiple hats - we value experts but appreciate jacks of all trades.
‚Ä¢ You thrive in a drama-free, calm, and systematic problem-solving environment.
‚Ä¢ You love challenges and are always ready to roll up your sleeves.
‚Ä¢ You believe in working smarter, not harder - prioritizing productivity and quality over punching the clock.
‚Ä¢ Above all, you follow your passion and have fun while doing it.

Equal opportunities for everyone üíñ
To truly represent our vibrant and diverse BlueThrone community, we prioritize diversity and inclusion. We are committed to fostering an environment where everyone can do their best work. We strongly encourage applicants of all backgrounds. We consider all candidates regardless of age, ethnicity, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, family or parental status, national origin, veteran status, neurodiversity, or disability. If you need reasonable adjustments at any point in the application or interview process, please let us know.

Join us in a role that's more than a job - it's a chance to be part of a transformative mission propelling mobile apps to unparalleled success.

jobs_results.title: Mobile Applications Developer
jobs_results.description:
CareerFinders, on behalf of our client, an expanding Information Technology company with offices in Limassol, we are seeking to recruit an experienced and talented Mobile Applications Developer to join their expanding team of professionals. The successful applicant must have proven experience in a similar position and possess outstanding communication skills in English.

Key Duties/Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ To work as part of the development team.
‚Ä¢ Assist on the development of current bespoke modules and solutions.
‚Ä¢ Your primary focus will be mobile development on both Android and iOS platforms plus the integration and core development of our clients API and SDK.
‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain front-end and business tier modules/API, required to support business needs.
‚Ä¢ Deliver good quality API documentation and manuals.

Key Skills/Experience:
‚Ä¢ Must have degree/diploma in Computer Science or Engineering or equivalent experience.
‚Ä¢ 3+ years of practical mobile application development experience is highly desirable (iOS & Android).
‚Ä¢ Practical knowledge and experience with the following technologies is highly desirable: HTML & DHTML, XSLT, XML, CSS, Java, JavaScript, React Native, NodeJS, ASP.net and SOLIDITY.
‚Ä¢ Experience in API/SDK development is highly advantageous.
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication (oral and written), interpersonal, organizational, and presentation skills.
‚Ä¢ Able to work independently and efficiently to meet deadlines.

To apply for this vacancy, please send your CV, along with any covering letter to jobs@careerfinders.com.cy quoting the reference number CYP4580. Please note that due to the high volumes of applications received only shortlisted applicants will be responded to. By sending us your CV you are giving CareerFinders your consent to be contacted for this and any other suitable vacancies that we believe match your skills and experience. To view our privacy policy, please click www.careerfinders.com.cy/privacy-policy.

jobs_results.title: Mobile (Flutter) Developer
jobs_results.description:
Employment Type: Full Time

Location: Limassol, Cyprus

Higher Hires are working with an international financial services brand with offices around the globe, and are seeking to recruit a passionate and self-motivated Mobile (Flutter) Developer for their office in Limassol.

Requirements:

¬∑ Design and build sophisticated and highly scalable apps using Flutter

¬∑ 3+ years‚Äô experience in mobile software development

¬∑ Experience with third party libraries and API‚Äôs

¬∑ Understanding of the agile development life-cycle

¬∑ Experience with automated testing and building

¬∑ Experience with Git version control tool

jobs_results.title: Mobile Application Software Developer
jobs_results.description:
CareerFinders, on behalf of our client an expanding Group of Companies with diverse business interests including Internet Marketing and Crypto Currencies, we are seeking to recruit a Mobile Application Software Developer to join their team in Limassol.

Key Duties/Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Mobile development for both Android and iOS platforms, plus the integration and core development of API and SDK.
‚Ä¢ Integrating the front-end elements built by co-workers into the application.
‚Ä¢ Working as part of the development team, assisting in the development of current bespoke modules and solutions.
‚Ä¢ Proficient with Swift and possessing an understanding of the Apple developer platform.
‚Ä¢ Blockchain understanding and development.
‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain front end and business tier modules/API, required to support business needs.
‚Ä¢ Able to deliver documentation to an acceptable standard.
‚Ä¢ Understanding the entire lifecycle of B2B/B2C concepts.
‚Ä¢ Commercial development experience with the java script ,AngularJS,React Native, NodeJS, PHP,Java or C# languages.

Key Skills/Experience:
‚Ä¢ University degree in Computer Science or Engineering or equivalent experience.
‚Ä¢ Web and Mobile Application Development, Commercial Knowledge and experience in HTML & DHTML, XSLT, XML, CSS, JAVA, JAVASCRIPT, REACT NATIVE,NodeJS,ASP.net, SOLIDITY.
‚Ä¢ Minimum 3 years of commercial experience, in any of the following Angularjs, React Native, NodeJS, Java and Swift.
‚Ä¢ Commercial experience in API/SDK development.
‚Ä¢ Minimum 1 year of experience in developing Smart contracts on the Ethereum protocol.
‚Ä¢ Preference given to candidates who can show portfolio of previous projects/assignments.
‚Ä¢ Able to work independently and efficiently to meet deadlines, while multitasking multiple projects to tight deadlines.
‚Ä¢ Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
‚Ä¢ Outstanding interpersonal, organisational and presentation skills, with the ability to provide feedback to Manager on a daily/weekly basis as required on all related projects.
‚Ä¢ Basic understanding of front-end technologies, and n-tier architecture.
‚Ä¢ Ability to write clean and concise code, as well as understand the development life-cycle process.
‚Ä¢ Ability to quickly pickup new development languages and deliver good quality API documentations and manuals.

To apply for this vacancy, please send your CV, along with any covering letter to jobs@careerfinders.com.cy quoting the above job title. Please note that due to the high volumes of applications received only shortlisted applicants will be responded to. By sending us your CV you are giving CareerFinders your consent to be contacted for this and any other suitable vacancies that we believe match your skills and experience. To view our privacy policy, please click www.careerfinders.com.cy/privacy-policy

jobs_results.title: Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Belarus, Poland, Kazakhstan

We are looking for experienced Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers to join our core product ‚Äì BOSS Revolution.

You have a chance to work with a team of outstanding professionals on a challenging product.

You will never be bored‚Äîour team is dynamic, as are our products. Be ready to face thrilling professional challenges and use your strong hard and soft skills to solve them as a Team player.

Your primary responsibility is end-to-end development and support of our user experience in our customer-facing apps.

Join us if you want to:
‚Ä¢ Have a unique work experience with a really strong engineering team!
‚Ä¢ Become a part of a multinational and cross-functional team.
‚Ä¢ Boost your career with a big international product company and have new growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Work on new innovative features and bug fixes in a Scrum Team.
‚Ä¢ Take responsibility for the full software development life-cycle.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with business stakeholders and be a part of the product development team.
‚Ä¢ Demonstrate your technology-agnostic positive attitude with the ability to learn and desire to implement solutions using various technologies.
‚Ä¢ Work on high-performing, mission-critical, scalable, and resilient applications and services.
‚Ä¢ Drive aggressive technical debt reduction in close collaboration with developers and automation test engineers.
Join us, if you have:
‚Ä¢ Have around one year of Flutter cross-platform development experience.
‚Ä¢ Have 5+ years of hands-on mobile development experience (Android and/or iOS).
‚Ä¢ Are truly passionate about mobile development.
‚Ä¢ Can communicate in English (B2+).
‚Ä¢ Are a constant learner.
You can please us with:
‚Ä¢ Experience in configuring mobile CI pipelines.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge and experience beyond mobile stack.
We offer you:
‚Ä¢ An exciting and challenging job with talented people around.
‚Ä¢ Really good hardware (a laptop with 32 GB RAM and 512 GB SSD).
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Remote work opportunity (with the opportunity to work from offices in Minsk and Warsaw).
‚Ä¢ Superb English lessons.A few words about us:

IDT Corporation is a global communications company founded in 1990 and headquartered in Newark, New Jersey. We are industry leaders in prepaid communication and payment services and one of the largest international voice carriers. We are listed on the NYSE, employ over 1800 people across 20 countries, and have over $1.5 billion in revenues.

We are not ‚Äùanother big IT corporation‚Äù‚Äî we encourage and support in-house entrepreneurs in developing their ideas into business actions.

Our flagship brand, Boss Revolution, offers Money Transfer, International Calling, and Mobile Top-Up services and supports IDT‚Äôs mission of enabling people to keep in touch and share resources with family and friends worldwide.

If you are here, it seems like you are interested, so let‚Äôs chat! üòâ

This offer from "IDT Corporation" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Mobile Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Our Client is looking for someone to join their already Big Data experts and developers‚Äô team. Their focus is on creating a common set of scalable, data-centric solutions. The successful candidate should have a Solid understanding of the Android Studio IDE or XCode and experience working with the Android SDK or iOS development kit, third-party libraries and APIs.

Job Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Develop native Android and/or iOS applications
‚Ä¢ Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code
‚Ä¢ Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable Java/Kotlin or Swift code
‚Ä¢ Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
‚Ä¢ Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
‚Ä¢ Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization

Requirements
‚Ä¢ Good knowledge of Object-Oriented Programming
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of the Android Studio IDE or XCode
‚Ä¢ Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends and emerging technologies
‚Ä¢ Previous software development experience
‚Ä¢ Experience working with the Android SDK or iOS development kit, third-party libraries and APIs
‚Ä¢ Good understanding of software development life cycle
‚Ä¢ Enthusiastic about developing knowledge and skills
‚Ä¢ Strong problem solving and critical thinking
‚Ä¢ A self-starter, with an eye for detail and good organizational skills

Desirable
‚Ä¢ Experience of using and integrating web APIs
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with unit testing / TDD
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with SQL, Maven, REST, Git
‚Ä¢ Familiar with Agile / Scrum development
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with task tracking systems (JIRA)
